assignments.name: Set_Schedule_for_Day_of_Week
assignments.label: Set Schedule for Day of Week

formulas.name: boolValidDay
formulas.expression: IF( OR( AND( {!intDayOfWeekFromDate} = 1, {!Sunday_Toggle.value} ) , AND( {!intDayOfWeekFromDate} = 2, {!Monday_Toggle.value} ) , AND( {!intDayOfWeekFromDate} = 3, {!Tuesday_Toggle.value} ) , AND( {!intDayOfWeekFromDate} = 4, {!Wednesday_Toggle.value} ) , AND( {!intDayOfWeekFromDate} = 5, {!Thursday_Toggle.value} ) , AND( {!intDayOfWeekFromDate} = 6, {!Friday_Toggle.value} ) , AND( {!intDayOfWeekFromDate} = 7, {!Saturday_Toggle.value} ) ) , TRUE , FALSE )

formulas.name: dtScheduleEndDateTime
formulas.expression: DATETIMEVALUE( TEXT( YEAR( {!dateToEvaluate} ) ) + "-" + TEXT( MONTH( {!dateToEvaluate} ) ) + "-" + TEXT( DAY( {!dateToEvaluate} ) ) + " " + CASE( {!intDayOfWeekFromDate} , 1, {!strEndTimeSunday} , 2, {!strEndTimeMonday} , 3, {!strEndTimeTuesday} , 4, {!strEndTimeWednesday} , 5, {!strEndTimeThursday} , 6, {!strEndTimeFriday} , 7, {!strEndTimeSaturday} , "00:00:00" ) ) + ({!intTimezoneHoursOffset} / 24)

formulas.name: dtScheduleStartDateTime
formulas.expression: DATETIMEVALUE( TEXT( YEAR( {!dateToEvaluate} ) ) + "-" + TEXT( MONTH( {!dateToEvaluate} ) ) + "-" + TEXT( DAY( {!dateToEvaluate} ) ) + " " + CASE( {!intDayOfWeekFromDate} , 1, {!strStartTimeSunday} , 2, {!strStartTimeMonday} , 3, {!strStartTimeTuesday} , 4, {!strStartTimeWednesday} , 5, {!strStartTimeThursday} , 6, {!strStartTimeFriday} , 7, {!strStartTimeSaturday} , "00:00:00" ) ) + ({!intTimezoneHoursOffset} / 24)

fields.name: Confirmation_Screen_Msg
fields.fieldText: Success! The new Staff Availability Schedules have been generated.

fields.name: Error_Inserting_Schedules_Screen_Msg
fields.fieldText:
Hmm... something went wrong. There was an error trying to insert Staff Availability Schedules.


Error: {!$Flow.FaultMessage}
